Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As technology advances, discover why we must respect Mother Nature as the ultimate power on this planet.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Recreating Wetlands, Mapping the Ocean Floor and Watching the Brain Work
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out how science is turning back the clock on 100 years of industrial salt production to restore healthy wetlands and see the secrets of the ocean floor using sound and laser technology. And, the thought process of human brain, once a black box, are being explored in new ways.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Science of Big Waves, Spider Boat and Killer Tree Disease
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The monster waves at Mavericks attract big wave surfers from around the world. But what makes them so big? And, engineer Ugo Conti who has sailed the world has always suffered from seasickness. See his "Proteus" design- a spider-like sea craft made for smoother sailing. And Sudden Oak Death is a killer with no cure and it's devastating oak trees around the world.

Clip.Title: SPACE SHUTTLE: FINAL COUNTDOWN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: July 21, 2011 marked not only the end of the space shuttle program, but the end of an era. Over the last 30 years, the shuttles Atlantis, Columbia, Challenger, Discovery and Endeavour have had many triumps and tragedies, as told by the astronauts, NASA scientists, and designers who helped this ambitious program take flight.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev Ruth Wright's First United Church welcomes all those who have bottomed out on their luck in Vancouver.
